title: Prototyping Process
description: Prototyping is an important process when it comes to creating your own game. There are various directions and methods to build a prototype, including digital and non-digital practices. If you are interested in non-digital methods, you can follow this link and get inspiration for your own level design technique. There's also a collection of different digital tools that can all be helpful for creating your levels. In the following though, we would like to introduce an example by Alex K. of level prototyping that uses both non-digital and digital methods to guide you through the whole process and all the various iterations of the steps. Whether you want to get inspiration for your own individual approach or follow this example is up to your preference.
